title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment focuses on the fundamental principles of rocket propulsion, covering various propulsion systems.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze the combustion processes in rocket engines and their efficiency.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle based on specific thrust requirements and test its performance.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz assessing knowledge of aerodynamic principles and their applications.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Conduct a detailed analysis of airflow patterns around an airfoil.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate the heating effects in aerodynamic structures during flight.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural element for a spacecraft, considering material properties and stress analysis.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate the orbital parameters for a satellite in low Earth orbit.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam covering systems engineering principles and methodologies in spacecraft design.
